titles.title: District of Columbia Transportation Funding Equality Act
District of Columbia Transportation Funding Equality Act
To amend title 49, United States Code, to treat the District of Columbia as a State for purposes of certain grant programs, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Highways and Transit.

bill.summary:
District of Columbia Transportation Funding Equality Act
This bill treats the District of Columbia as a state with respect to the Department of Transportation's grant program for buses and bus facilities. Currently, the District is treated as a territory under the program.
